description: Piggy Que is the roaming home of the most delicious barbeque with attitude that you’ll ever get to dig right into. This epic truck with their char-grill ablaze, serves up the best big juicy burgers, BBQ sandwiches, ribs, and steak, and more. All of their sensational comfort creations will straight up awake your taste buds, so when you spot Piggy Que on the streets, be sure to hit the brakes. Come on out to Piggy Que to get a taste of this crazy-satisfying southern food that satiates the smiling mouths found all throughout Walnut, Mississippi.
name: Piggy Que BBQ & Burgers Food Truck
